Class Sonnet

java.lang.Object
Sonnet
public class Sonnet extends Object
A quiz of words from Prithee (for Pat?).

The program reads a sonnet from a file (Prithee), randomly selects a word, and asks the user to guess the word after printing the Sonnet up to that word. The program continues until the user gets 3 correct or 3 incorrect answers.

      Throws:

      userAnswer - the user's answer
      Returns:
